channel.title: Shared - Shared Kernel on tangly Components
channel.description: Recent content in Shared - Shared Kernel on tangly Components

item.title: Readme
item.description: Purpose The tangly erp shared bounded domain component provides regular business model abstractions for business applications written in Java. The component is using records and requires Java 21 LTS or higher. Try it out. Download and Documentation The library can be included in Maven as <dependency> <groupId>net.tangly.erp</groupId> <artifactId>shared</artifactId> <version>0.2.7</version> </dependency> The library can be included in Gradle as implementation "net.tangly.erp:shared:0.2.7" The documentation can be found under Business documentation. Awesome Sponsors and Developers Corporate sponsors are

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: ERP Shared Library Change Logs This document provides a high-level view of the changes introduced in the ERP Shared library by release. For a detailed view of what has changed, refer to the repository commits. 0.2.7 (2024-05-31) Update of library dependencies, update to JDK-21, and modern Gradle approach to build solutions. 0.2.6 (2021-08-31) First version of the library packed as a DDD bounded domain Requires Java 16 or higher due to extensive usage of records and sealed classes
